Name: Christmas Live Wallpaper
About the game: Classic Live Wallpaper now on Windows! Christmas Live Wallpaper is a stunning 3D live wallpaper featuring a sparkling animated Christmas tree , and exciting Christmas countdown where you can count the days to Christmas, New Year's day, or any date you set. This version also features a Clock scene , a combined Tree & Countdown / Clock scene , a Happy New Year scene with fireworks, a super realistic 3D Snow scene , a magical Sky Lanterns scene , plus a bonus Valentine's day scene , and dedicated Fireworks scene ! (That's 9-Wallpapers-in-1!) All scenes come with countless customisation options - right-click on the desktop or click the icon in the bottom-right notification area to open the settings panel and quickly customise your settings. Features and Personalisation Options ★ Christmas Tree scene (6 animated camera motions) ★ 4 Christmas trees and multi-coloured sparkle mode! ★ Countdown scene (Countdown to Christmas, New Year's Countdown, and more!) ★ Set your own custom countdown dates! (Ideal for birthdays and anniversaries!) ★ Combined Christmas Tree + Countdown or Clock ★ Clock scene with sparkling time and date. Great all year round! ★ Happy New Year scene (with fireworks!) ★ 3D Snow scene (day or night) ★ Sky Lanterns scene ★ 3D Fireworks scene ★ Valentine's Day scene ★ The ability to choose any combination of your favourite scenes above for rotation. ★ A range of vibrant colour schemes, with a beautiful colour cycling mode that sweeps through all the colours of the rainbow. ★ Gorgeous glowing background light or flare spotlight with shimmering sunbeams. ★ Choose your favourite camera angles and 3D animation fly-bys. ★ Snowfall amount and speed. ★ Additional tree lights. ★ Efficient code and wallpaper engine optimised to run smoothly to save battery power on phones - so great on laptops too! ★ Automatically pauses itself when hidden by other windows - drops to 0% when you run a game or other fullscreen app. ★ Option to count down in either rounded-up days (the traditional days-to-Christmas method), or a fully accurate and nail-biting Days, Hours, Minutes and Seconds method. ★ NEW Multi-monitor support! ★ and lots lots more to play with! Have fun! :) If you run into a problem, please contact us at: support@jetblacksoftware.com and we'll help you directly. Thanks!
